00026                 public static function encode_chunklength($txt, $chunk_length = 32, $separator = "-")
00027                 {
00028                         $b32 = self::encode($txt);
00029                         $buf = "";
00030                         while (strlen($b32) > 0)
00031                         {
00032                                 $buf .= substr($b32, 0, $chunk_length) . $separator;
00033                                 $b32 = substr($b32, $chunk_length);
00034                         }
00035                         return $buf;
00036                 }
